Richard Amador
Senior Product Analyst in Jersey City, NJ

About Me

I began my product career working in application support in a small, fast-pased FinTech company where I built dashboards and built custom business process for clients in C#. Interfacing with clients and understanding their pain points became useful in my next role as a product analyst. In this role I was tasked with managing multiple projects and seeing them through from requirements gathering to project completion. In this role, I honed my product knowledge and skills by maintaining a backlog of issues and enhancements and working with developers to roll out new features.

I describe myself as a self-starter who's always looking to learn something new. I'm currently working through a few projects building applications using Ruby on Rails which has been a ton of fun. I'm in search of a new challenge and opportunity to expand my product knowledge.

Interests

My personal interests include:

  • Salsa Dancing: I began dancing salsa in college and it's still a passion of mine.
  • Product Management: My current role as a Product Analyst has driven me to learn more about the role of Product Managers and the impact they have on the success of a product.
  • Building: I love the build things. Whether I'm building furniture with a carpenter friend or building a web app, creating something from nothing always facinates me.

Recent Projects

  • Built a blog web application
  • Worked with a small group to develop an asset management web application to manage inspections on bridges
